input.sentences: the abandoned building had a variety of graffiti .
this entire wall was covered with a variety of colors
and near it was this broken machine .
the combination of broken glass and rust
came together for an interesting compliment to the colors of the art .
output.sentences: There was a huge wall, which they had to climb over to enter the facility.
Inside, they found lots of broken down machinery.
There were piles of rusty metal and broken glass everywhere.
But there was hope, in the form of beautiful graffiti.
